definition: Ji River, former river of north-eastern China which disappeared after the Yellow River flooded in 1852

surname Shui

sentences.english: The Yuanju old county is a famous historical city in old Jishui river valley.

sentences.english: If they only know how to cook "water JACKIE water, " so who would want to drink the soup?
sentences.chinese: 若厨师只懂得“以水济水”，这样的汤谁愿意喝？
